text: All right.  Okay.  Today we are going to work on volume, but before we get to volume, I'd like to tell you that you're going to have a box.  You're going to work in pairs. You're going to have a box to work on and find out how many of this – this is a cubic centimeter, or a centimeter cube, right?  You're going to find out how many of these cubic centimeters that I have in my hands here, that you need to fill up this box.  Now you've got to come up with strategies to do it, right?
